text: The 2014 African Handball Champions League was the 36th edition, organized by the African Handball Confederation, under the auspices of the International Handball Federation, the handball sport governing body. The tournament was held from October 9–18, 2014 in four venues: Salle Beni Khiar, Salle Hammamet, Salle Nabeul and Salle Zouaoui, in Tunis, Tunisia, contested by 10 teams and won by Club Africain of Tunisia. Club African and Al Ahly qualified to the 2015 IHF Super Globe. ==Preliminary rounds == :Times given below are in CET UTC+1. ===Group A=== {| style="text-align:center" width=550 |- ! width=30%| ! width=15%| !
